intro: Tephrosia graminifolia, commonly known as slender tephrosia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa and Asia. It is a member of the Fabaceae family, characterized by its compound leaves and pod fruits. The plant typically grows as an herb or shrub, reaching heights of up to 1 meter. Its small, yellow flowers are arranged in racemes, and it produces small, flat pods containing several seeds. Tephrosia graminifolia is often found in moist, well-drained soils and is sometimes used in traditional medicine.
